reviewText: One of the discs had the wrong region, so Disc 1 is unplayable. All other discs work great.

This is not the step up movies, it sexy dance?
Plus it in Spanish, not English

Was wondering if this could be heard in the English language? It just arrived and I don't want to open it unless I can hear it in English. I guess I didn't realize it was French when I bought it. Other than that you deserve a good rating bc the package was on time and safely arrived.
